commitResults.messageTitle: Update command summary in the User Guide
commitResults.messageBody:
Indicate command format and examples for add, delete and list.

Remove AB3 command summary of 'clear', 'edit', 'find' and 'help'
actions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update UserGuide and upload profile picture
commitResults.messageBody:
Use pure HTML instead of mixing it with GitHub Favoured Markdown for
command summary

Remove viewing help, editing entries, locating entries and clearing
all entries since they will not be implemented in v1.2

Upload a profile picture and update the corresponding AboutUs page.

Add models for Class Group, its ID, type and module code
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently,
* ClassGroupId supports only numeric IDs e.g. 01, 11
* ClassGroupType supports only alphabets e.g. LEC, TUT
* ModuleCode supports only CS-coded modules e.g. CS2105, CS2103T

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Module to TaModule due to conflict with java.lang.Module
Prefix common classes (Logic, Model) with AB3 to pass AB3 test cases
commitResults.messageBody:
These classes are to be replaced with our own Logic and Model. Once the
test cases for our own classes are up, we can delete the AB3 tests.

Renaming these files now would allow us to distribute our workload
without focusing on the CI failing due to the existing test cases.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to pass checkstyle
Create Entity class to group Student, TaModule and ClassGroup
commitResults.messageBody:
Grouping the classes will allow better abstraction in logic, e.g.
to change add entity in the model one can call
model.addEntity(entity).

commitResults.messageTitle: Create TAssist as abstraction for all 3 lists used in model
Modify common classes to be compatible with TAssist
Update MainApp to use modified Logic and Model
commitResults.messageBody:
Logic still contain traces of AB3 (getFilteredPersonList method),
to be removed once UI does not need this metho

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix javadocs and identify methods to be updated or removed in future
Add AcademicYear field to TaModule
commitResults.messageBody:
The field comes with a toStringInFull() method, which will return
the academic year as a full string. E.g. 21S1 will return
the string "2021/2022 Semester 1".

commitResults.messageTitle: Update semester naming to be consistent with NUS naming
